com.net

Class ClientSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.net.ClientSocket

  • public class ClientSocket
extends java.lang.Object
    Connects the system to a server via sockets. Also handles sending of requests to the server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors
